Registry

We are registered at Bed Bath & Beyond and Crate and Barrel

We'd be equally thrilled if you would make a donation in our honor to a local charity of your choice or one we care about in Cleveland such as Playhouse Square or Cleveland Food Bank, in lieu of a gift to us.

Wedding Party

Meet the people taking part in our special day!

Ryan Irvine

Best Man

Ryan and Adam met at their first job after college in Cleveland, and have worked together now at four different jobs. On purpose, not by accident!

Alex Janes

Groomsman

Alex is one of Adam's first friends from college and the two then lived together off-campus and both always did the dishes without complaining.

Dan Gregorich

Groomsman

Dan and Adam have been friends since high school and have travelled the world together, including trips to Spain and Japan!

Steve Kemeny

Groomsman

Steve was the first friend Adam made in college, when his parents and Steve's parents met in the dorm hallway as they were helping move them in at Virginia Tech.

Marshall Walcer

Groomsman

Marshall and Adam became friends as cub scouts. They achieved a glorious 15 minutes of fame together starring as an alien and robot in the Solon Library summer reading program promo video.

Michelle Doyle

Maid of Honor

Michelle and Rebecca’s friendship began while consoling one another over a bucket of Moose tracks ice cream, after we both did not make the eighth-grade cheerleading squad, what else was there to live for? These two have had each other’s tracks, I mean backs, ever sense.

Nicole DeChant

Bridesmaid

Nicole and Rebecca met in Junior high school. These two have shared many things together over the years, an apartment, the love of shoes and a few late nights. These ladies have made some great memories together.

Jacqueline Gedeon

Bridesmaid

What is there to say? Jacqueline is going to be a fabulous sister in law, she’s a great sailor and she puts up with Rebecca’s brother. One may say she is a triple threat.

Kathy Marino

Bridesmaid

Definitely, nothing but love, and laughs when these two get together. You can usually find Kathy and Rebecca hanging out by a nice fire, reminiscing about days gone by and singing along to almost any Broadway musical we can remember the words to.

Jillian Tubbs

Bridesmaid

Let’s just say our families get each other. Jillian and Rebecca bonded in High School, singing in Choir and playing Tennis. Fun times were always had whenever these two got together.

Morgan Dotlich

Junior Bridesmaid

More recently known as TINK! -Morgan and Rebecca are cousins and have always been close. Rebecca and Morgan share a love for the important things in life, good music, friends and family.

Lauren Becker & Lila Becker

Flower Girls

Lauren and Lila are Rebecca’s youngest cousins. Rounding off the Becker grandchildren at number 19 & 20 these two are super close. They are both so fun, super sweet and too cute. We can’t wait to see these two on the dance floor!

About Us

How we met

How we met - Rebecca and Adam met in December 2012, while attending a 'tweetup', or a Twitter Meetup at Hodge's in downtown Cleveland for News Channel 5. Essentially, they met through friends. Through a series of missed connections, it took almost a month before setting up a first date, but the second, third and fourth followed in quick succession!

The engagement

It was October 2016, and the Cleveland Indians were in the playoffs. Adam and Rebecca had a trip to Mexico planned for a week. All her friends were asking, 'Is he going to propose there? How scenic, how romantic!'. But Adam had other plans. The night before their trip, they managed to get standing room tickets to ALCS game 1 against Toronto. Everything seemed to be calm and normal, with the game scoreless through the first five innings. During the 6th, Adam handed Rebecca a gift from the teamshop, she opened the bag, pulled out a jersey with 'Fishman' on the back, as Adam got down on one knee and proposed. What seemed like only seconds later, Fransico Lindor hit a home run and the whole stadium cheered (We still think it was for us).
